resources.string: This application is a very simple utility which allows you to explore each sensor available on an Android device. This is mainly intended to be an instructional and experimental application to help facilitate further exploration in application development using Android sensors. Each sensor is itemized in a list and when selected displays both informational and real-time data as well as the ability to search for more information on the selected sensor.\n\nAnyone is free to distribute, use and abuse this software as necessary. Enjoy!
